titleStmt.title: A newe yeares gift for the suole [sic], or A christian meditation of Christs incarnation Preached in the Cathedrall Church at Norwich on Christmasse day last. 1614. By Samuel Garey, preacher of Gods word at Winfarthing.
titleStmt.author: Garey, Samuel, 1582 or 3-1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Ssansby [sic], for Henry Fetherstone,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A new-yeeres gift for the soule.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
